The Farm.description: Green farmland spreads to all corners of the horizons.

bread_recipe.name: Make some bread
bread_recipe.description: Take 15 grain, make a sweet slice of bread

loaf_recipe.name: Loaf of bread
loaf_recipe.description: Take 3 slices of bread, stick em together, you got yourself a loaf, buddy.

The Workshop.description: Smoke rises steadily, a hammer bangs on.

The Dump.description: You can smell it from here, the waste rotting away.

The Marketplace.description: Loud vendors sell their wares, trying to get the jump on the next customer walking by.

The Arena.description: Ruthless barbarians and their warriors fight to the death, for the pleasure of the crowd.

The Graveyard.description: A dark shadow on the hill looms silently, as if watching and waiting. The dead lay here.

The Underscape.description: Ungodly noises are heard at all hours of the day. The townsfolk never get close enough to discover what really happens.

The Mine.description: A small dark shaft belies the size of the caverns underneath.
